nodes.text: JB-9 was a BB-series astromech droid, manufactured by Industrial Automaton, that belonged to the Droid Depot in Black Spire Outpost on the planet Batuu. During the First Order's occupation of Batuu in 34 ABY, JB-9 was displayed alongside fellow astromech droids MB-12 and J1-B2 in an alcove behind one of the counters in the depot. Standing 0.67 meters tall, it had black and yellow paneling and a black sensor.
JB-9 appeared as a prop within the themed land Star Wars: Galaxy's Edge, which opened to guests at Disneyland Park and Disney's Hollywood Studios Park in 2019.
